sentences.en: Chinese intellectual property separate law needs to add additional protection to the anti - unethical competition law.
sentences.cn: 中国的知识产权单行法,需增加 反 不正当竞争法的附加保护.

sentences.en: He has embezzled state - owned assets through various unethical ways.
sentences.cn: 他以各种不正当手段猎食 国有 资产.

sentences.en: I disapproved of their unethical actions.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成他们的不道德行为.

sentences.en: It is arrogant and wrong to claim that Chinese companies are particularly unethical.
sentences.cn: 宣称中国企业特别不道德是盲目的、错误的.

sentences.en: It's simply unethical to promote and advertise such a dangerous product.
sentences.cn: 宣传推广如此危险的产品完全是不道德的。

sentences.en: NINETOWNS of unethical behavior, allows gamers to wreck the heart.
sentences.cn: 九城的不道德行为, 让玩家伤透了心.

sentences.en: Other competitors might sue him for illegal and unethical behavior.
sentences.cn: 其他竞争者可能因为他的非法和不道德行为而起诉他.

sentences.en: People no longer vivisect animals -- it's considered unethical.
sentences.cn: 人们不再活体解剖动物, 因为 这被认为是不道德的.

sentences.en: Refuse to buy from dealers who are known to be illegal and unethical.
sentences.cn: 拒绝从众所周知的违法和不道德的经销商那里购买设备.

sentences.en: Since it is a painkiller, denying it to athletes in training would be unethical.
sentences.cn: 由于它只是一种止痛药, 要运动员在训练受伤时完全不用它是缺乏道德的.

sentences.en: So human cloning is, and will, I hope, continue, to be unethical.
sentences.cn: 因此我相信, 人的克隆现在是, 将来仍然是不道德的.

sentences.en: Students are encouraged to report any unethical incidence to the management immediately.
sentences.cn: 如有职员实施不道德的销售策略,我们鼓励学生向校方管理层举报.

sentences.en: The layman is generally more concerned with their possible unethical uses.
sentences.cn: 外行人通常担心它们可能产生非道德的用途.

sentences.en: The more immediate the consequences of the potentially unethical practice, the stronger the case for whistleblowing.
sentences.cn: 更直接的后果可能是不道德的实践, 对告密.

sentences.en: They should safeguard the public against illegal or unethical professional conduct.
sentences.cn: 他们要保护公众,让他们免于违法的和不合道德的职业行为.

words.tran_cn: 不道德的；缺乏职业道德的
